Generate fake images of PMs.

**Usage**

- `/fakepm username:<string> message:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `username` | `string` | Yes | The username to put on the image. | - |
| `message` | `string` | Yes | The message. | - |
